title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Executive Bonuses
content:
Put your Staff to work sourcing Special Cargo at double the usual speed this week, and complete Special Cargo Sales to rake in 2X GTA$ and RP. Selling GTA$300,000 worth of Special Cargo throughout the week will complete the Weekly Challenge and land you GTA$100,000 as a reward.

Pawning off extra crates in Export Mixed Goods will also dish out Double Rewards through September 18.
